= Fedora Core 7 =

== Binary packages ==
Packages are available for both linkage and rb_libtorrent, all you have to do is run the following as root.
{{{
yum -y install boost gtkmm24 libnotify curl dbus-glib libupnp
rpm -ivh http://linkage.googlecode.com/files/rb_libtorrent-0.12-1.fc7.i386.rpm
rpm -ivh http://linkage.googlecode.com/files/linkage-0.1.2-1.fc7.i386.rpm
}}}

== Subversion install ==
The SVN version has the same dependencies as above, except for libupnp. Optional dependencies are curl, gupnp, exo, libgnomemm, gnome-vfsmm and libgnomeuimm.

(You will need the -devel packages to build linkage, however after installation you can safely remove the -devel packages if you wish)
{{{
yum -y install curl-devel exo-devel libgnomemm26-devel gnome-vfsmm26-devel libgnomeuimm26-devel
yum -y install subversion libtool autoconf automake boost-devel gtkmm24-devel \
libnotify-devel dbus-glib-devel gcc-c++
rpm -ivh http://linkage.googlecode.com/files/rb_libtorrent-devel-0.12-1.fc7.i386.rpm
svn checkout http://linkage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ linkage
cd linkage
./autogen.sh --prefix=/usr
make
make install
}}}

= Ubuntu Feisty 7.04 =

== Source install ==
Currently there are no packages for rb_libtorrent nor linkage for Ubuntu. So if you want to install linkage you have to build them both from source.

Libtorrent can be downloaded [http://sourceforge.net/project/downloading.php?group_id=79942&filename=libtorrent-0.12.tar.gz here]. To build linkage on Ubuntu you must use the [http://code.google.com/p/linkage/source SVN] version (rev 223 or higher).

{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential
sudo apt-get install libboost-date-time-dev libboost-date-time1.33.1 \
libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-filesystem1.33.1 libboost-regex-dev \
libboost-regex1.33.1 libboost-signals-dev libboost-signals1.33.1 \
libboost-iostreams-dev libboost-iostreams1.33.1 \
libboost-thread-dev libboost-thread1.33.1 libboost-dev
cd libtorrent-0.12
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
}}}

{{{
sudo apt-get install subversion libtool autoconf automake
sudo apt-get install libgtkmm-2.4-dev libnotify-dev libcurl3-dev \
libdbus-glib-1-dev libgtkmm-2.4-1c2a libnotify1 libcurl3 libdbus-glib-1-2 \
libgnomemm-2.6-1c2a libgnomemm-2.6-dev libgnomeuimm-2.6-1c2a libgnomeuimm-2.6-devel \
libgnome-vfsmm-2.6-1c2a libgnome-vfsmm-2.6-dev libexo-0.3-0 libexo-0.3-dev
svn checkout http://linkage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ linkage
cd linkage
./autogen.sh --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
}}}
